document_title: What is dyslipidemia? Causes, symptoms, prevention
subsection_content: To check for high, low, or healthy levels of LDL, HDL, and triglycerides, your doctor will perform a blood test. This level will change each year, so it is necessary to have a blood test every year. If you are taking medication for dyslipidemia, your doctor may order more frequent blood tests.
subsection_title: roi loan lipid mau.json. Diagnostic method
subsection_data:
roi loan lipid mau.json. Diagnostic method
To check for high, low, or healthy levels of LDL, HDL, and triglycerides, your doctor will perform a blood test. This level will change each year, so it is necessary to have a blood test every year. If you are taking medication for dyslipidemia, your doctor may order more frequent blood tests.
